entry.title: Request for comment about Meetup group!
entry.content: I’m Matthew, a Tampa native and long-time user of Python.

entry.title: Meetup revitalization survey results
entry.content: Hi members of TBP, it’s been one week since the survey was published for the group to share your opinions. Thanks for taking the time. It helped better understand what you want to see in the community.
entry.summary: Hi members of TBP, it’s been one week since the survey was published for the group to share your opinions. Thanks for taking the time. It helped better understand what you want to see in the community.
